result.title: New division system on CodeChef!
result.content:
On their 9th birthday, Codechef has included a new rating division system!

I really like how two parallel contests will be held for each of the two divisions and rating changes will happen according to their own division group, much like how it's on codeforces.

It will also end up motivating div 2 guys to work hard to get to div 1.

Here is the official announcement blog.
